name: Pirate Hunter: Gold Rush
description:
Pirate Hunter: Gold Rush

Pirate ship cycles around trying to destroy you. Escape and loot as many gold coins as possible from the pirate ship. This game is developed for Extra Credits Game Jam #3.

Attribute:

Developer: Jonali Das
SFX: RubberDuck https://opengameart.org/content/25-cc0-bang-firework-sfx

Music by Matthew Pablo http://www.matthewpablo.com

Engine: Construct 2
